segments.text: My gaze shifts to the center-left, where the real action is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a young boy, precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into an open cabinet, one hand already in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination to get those cookies is quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl stands beside him, her hand outstretched, clearly complicit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're working together in this little heist, perfectly coordinated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed their elaborate scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If that stool collapses, it could be a nasty fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sound of it crashing would surely break her trance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope he gets a cookie out before he tumbles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for disaster and mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
